q: Simon Cowell says, you have to put your money where your mouth is. And this British music executive is positive he can find a global superstar. It's all about having that`` x'' factor. Is it the look? Is it the voice? Over the years recently you've seen a different kind of artist emerge. A good example of that is Lady Gaga - God only knows what we would have said to her if she had walked into` Idol' three years ago with a lobster on her head. But she's got it. The shake-up announced Thursday appears to be driven by Eric Schmidt 's desire to tackle other challenges as much as Larry Page 's ambition. Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Eric Schmidt wrote on his Twitter account moments after Google dropped the bombshell that upstaged its fourth-quarter earnings. Larry Page , now 37 and greying. While Eric Schmidt travels the world meeting with business partners, government officials and potential takeover targets, Larry Page says he will be making most of the big decisions as he tries to rekindle the soul and passion of a startup. Sergey Brin will concentrate on developing new products. He's worth$ 15 billion, but Larry Page remains something of a rebel who has always had a disdain for corporate protocol.

Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 White House race.`` I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified,'' he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either. 1. Zahi Hawass , Benjamin Netanyahu of state for antiquities, said that several ancient treasures had been stolen from the museum, including a statue of the renowned boy Abdullah II of Jordan Tutankhamun. The missing objects include a gilded wood statue of the 18th Dynasty Abdullah II of Jordan Tutankhamun being carried by a goddess and parts of another statue showing him harpooning, he said. to what the competitors will sing, how they will sing it and more.`` That means you have to work with them up to five or six days a week,'' Simon Cowell points out. So, I need to find someone willing to make that commitment because it is hard work.... It is important to me that I have people I can trust in terms of their expertise and their gut feeling. It is a difficult decision when you are putting a team around you. I also think it is important on show like this that you have people who are competitive with each other because essentially, the judges are taking part in this competition as well as the competitors.
